set-form-filename.name: set-form-filename
set-form-filename.displayName: Set FlowFile Form Data File Name

Max Length To Put In Attribute.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute
Max Length To Put In Attribute.displayName: Max Length To Put In Attribute

properties.filter:
SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE
WHERE lower("parameter") = 'pm10'
AND CAST("value" AS DOUBLE) > 8
